= Embedded Code Highlighting

[source, javascript]
----
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, World!");
  return 42;
}
----

[source, python]
----
def greet(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}")
    return True
----

[source, json]
----
{
  "key": "value",
  "number": 123
}
----

[source, csharp]
----
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main() {
        Console.WriteLine("Hello, World!");
    }
}
----

End of document.
